transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Namaskar Vinayak ji.
Executive: Namaskar. Ji Abhimanyu baat kar raha hu sir. Last time aap se discussion hua tha field visit ke liye IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Visit ke liye?
Customer: Ha aapke yaha sir visit karna hai na sir. Dekhiye sir ye one time mai jo hai na aapka field meeting arrange kara sakta hu sir. Jo aapka location hai sir yahi hona hai. Ha, 2 Mona Chambers near Hotel Kanchan, Mahatma Nagar, Trimbak Road, Nasik. Yahi hai na sir?
Customer: Hmm. Hmm.
Executive: Isi location pe chahiye na sir aapko?
Customer: Ha to mujhe field visit mere onboard me mere ko chahiye na yaar mahine me ek aadha to visit karao mere company me.
Executive: Nahi sir nahi mahine me ek baar nahi mai karwa sakta hu sir. Possible hi nahi hai sir. Aap samjhiye. Nahi nahi ho payega sir mahine me ek baar.
Customer: Kyu?
Executive: Kyuki sir aap.
Customer: Kyu nahi ho payega?
Customer: Ye ho sakta hai na aise kya problem hai mere ko samajh me nahi aata.
Executive: Sir aapko ek baar mai visit karwa de raha hu. Mai one time visit karwa paunga sir aur aap proper baith ke jo bhi discussion sari chije samajhna hai sir pure team ke sath sir samajh lijiye sir. Har month sir possible nahi ho payega sir kyuki aapka account Noida head office se handle ho raha hai. Right.
Customer: Mera kehna ye hai ki kam se kam hai na ek do teen visit to arrange karo jisme samajh me aaye aur kuch ek aadha isme samajh thodi aata hai yaar kabhi problem.
Executive: Sir ek baar me sir sari chije samajh jata hai sir. Aap already 9 saal se sir IndiaMART me sir chal rahe hai.
Customer: Abhi ha barobar hai lekin fir bhi mera kehna hai ki tum thoda sa samajh lo hum log kya bolte hai tum bhi samajh lo abhi kya hai naye naye bache rakhe hai.
Customer: Unko har chij thoda sa difficult lagta hai kisi ko kisi ko nahi lagta hai.
Executive: Isiliye to isiliye to mai keh raha hu na sir ki mera jo mera jo executive jo hai jo waha aapko jayega to aap apni puri team ke sath ek baar baith jaiye na sir. Wo proper har ek chij guide karke sir catalog correction roz to nahi hota hai na sir ek baar mai aapka pura correction complete karke sir aa jayega. Jo rest bacha rahega hum kar lenge ek baar aap visit ko sir lijiye dekhiye maine aapke liye higher authority se baat kiya uske baad sir mai arrange kara raha hu sir. Aap ye bhi to samjho na sir.
Customer: Mujhe mera fir boss se baat karni padegi. Unse baat karke fir batata hu mai aapko kab field aapka arrangement kar rahe hai iska. Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai to aap ye bataiye sir ki.
Customer: Ha ji boliye.
Customer: Abhi turant suno turant abhi mai bol nahi paunga. Abhi kya hai mujhe bhi bhejna padega unko bhi bhejna padega. Sari chije hamara time leti hai lekin hum log arrange kar lete hai usko. Thik hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi mai aapka meeting arrange karwa dunga to jo aapka ye concern hai na sir.
Customer: Ha unko bolo ki suitable date time pe aap bhejo kisi ko.
Executive: Ha bilkul. To wahi ek baar aap apne jo jinke sath discussion karna hai apne owner ke sath discussion karna hai.
Customer: Ye bolo the aap customer service bolte ho aur baad me aap service ki baat aati hai to aap provide nahi karte ho.
Executive: Sir service hum log online aapko jab chahe sir aapko provide karne ke liye ready hai sir. Right aap samjhiye sir.
Customer: Itna kharcha karne ke bawajud agar aapka ye tarika rahega to matlab nahi yaar onboard agar hame chahiye to chahiye aap bhejo na usme kya unse badi baat hai yaar aapko logo waha pe aap karo arrangement.
Executive: Mai sir aapke liye arrange kara raha hu sir aap ye dekho sir ki jo aapka account Noida head office se handle ho raha hai fir bhi sir mai aapko.
Customer: Mere office se baat kar lo mere office se uske baad mai dekhta hu thik hai.
Executive: Aap date and time ek confirm kijiye aur uske baad sir na hum usi date ko aapko meeting arrange karwa de rahe hai sir to mai aapko call kab karu sir ye bataiye finally call kab kare?
Customer: Are aap mat karo yaar mujhe abhi kya hai mai ja raha hu meeting mai bahar Nasik se abhi ek 40 kilometer lamba ja raha hu mai. Mera baat nahi ho payega aaj. Unse kal baat karunga uske baad fir aapko batata hu mai kab kar raha hai kya kar raha hai.
Executive: To sir aapka ek ticket bhi open hai na hamare paas sir use to hame close karna hoga na bina aapke permission ke kaise close karenge sir ye bataiye.
Executive: To sir close karne ka permission dijiye.
Customer: Nahi maine abhi isko clear nahi kar pa raha hu. Ab dekhiye na hum log karenge na baat mai aaj to possible nahi hai aaj mera meeting hai. Aaj mai ja raha hu out house. To ab mai office me reh jaunga mai. Mai bol raha hu ki aaj to possible nahi hai mere liye.
Executive: Nahi bilkul wo nahi mai meeting ke liye baat nahi kar raha hu sir meeting aapka jab chahiye na ek din mai aapka properly aap apne owner ke sath discuss karke aap mujhe jo jo aapne IndiaMART me concern open kiya hai sir uska hame tat count hota hai to wo hame close karne ka permission dijiye aur baki mai aapka meeting arrange karwa deta hu jis date ko aap kahenge us date ko.
Customer: Dekhiye yaar ye ek din ke liye matlab nahi yaar ek din ka kya fayda hai ek aadha mahine me kam se kam.
Executive: Sir ek baar aap miliye aapka maybe one day one day is enough sir ki aapka inquiries aapka jo bhi issue hai resolve ho jaye aap ek baar pehle miliye to sir aap jo mera executive ja raha hai aap unke sath baithiye aap properly ek din ke liye aap to aap pehle time me bhi sir pehle to possible nahi tha mai aapko arrange kara raha hu ab usme bhi sir aap deny kar rahe hai ki ek din ke liye.
Customer: Dekhta hu dekhta hu sir mai abhi gaadi chala raha hu highway pe hu.
Executive: Okay okay sir to mai ye aapka jo concern hai ye close karu sir kyuki iska sir tat count ho raha hai sir please.
Customer: Chalo close karo kya bolu fir se agar mujhe laga to mujhe laga fir se mai.
Executive: Nahi nahi fir se aap raise kyu karenge sir mai aapke liye arrange karne ke liye ready hu aap already maine wo whatsapp pe bhi aapko connect kiya hua hai aap dekhiye aapko whatsapp pe bhi message dala hua hai. Right.
Customer: Thik hai message thik hai na dekhta hu sir.
Executive: Thik hai sir to mai isko close kar raha hu sir okay thank you sir.
Customer: Okay chalo.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants field visit to his company monthly.

- Wants 2-3 visits for better understanding.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to arrange one-time field visit.

- Executive assured to arrange meeting as per date.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will confirm date after talking to boss.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- field visit, subscription, meeting, account
